sense.def:
The post
je sistem, ki zagotavlja pobiranje in dostavljanje pisem in paketov;

seg.quote: There is a cheque for you in the post.
Winners will be notified by post.

sense.def:
One's post
so pisma in pošiljke, ki pridejo na naš naslov.

seg.quote: There is some post for you.
Rose was reluctant to answer her post.

sense.def:
To post a letter or parcel
pomeni poslati pismo ali paket nekomu tako, da ga vržemo v poštni nabiralnik ali odnesemo na poštni urad.

seg.quote: I'm going to post a letter.
I'll be glad to post you details.

sense.def:
To keep someone posted
pomeni nekomu redno sporočati, kaj se dogaja.

seg.quote: David promised to keep them posted.

sense.def:
A post
je pokončna velika palica, zasajena v tla.

seg.quote: A dog sat chained to a post.

sense.def:
A post in an organization
je delovno mesto ali uradni položaj v organizaciji;

seg.quote: She is well qualified for the post.

sense.def:
To be posted somewhere
pomeni, da nas organizacija, za katero delamo, nekam pošlje.

seg.quote: I have been posted to Paris.
